abstract: Share buybacks by U.S. corporations could be back in style this year, as an improving economy makes companies more willing to loosen their purse strings to fund transactions that could reward investors with a higher share price.
snippet: Share buybacks by U.S. corporations could be back in style this year, as an improving economy makes companies more willing to loosen their purse strings to fund transactions that could reward investors with a higher share price.
lead_paragraph: Share buybacks by American corporations could be back in style this year, as an improving economy makes companies more willing to loosen their purse strings to fund transactions that could reward investors with a higher share price.

headline.main: Stock Buybacks Back in Vogue in 2010?
